auth.backgroundSubtitle: Powerful and easy to use multipurpose theme
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email address below and we'll send you password reset OTP.
auth.confirmationCodeSubtitle: Enter code at your mail and choose new password
auth.verifyOtpCodeSubtitle: Enter otp code that the system sends you via the phone number in your profile

cognito.exceedsMaxLengthError: Exceeds the maximum length of text field.
cognito.invalidPasswordPolicyError: Password must be least 6 characters, 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 numeric and 1 special character.
cognito.confirmPasswordNotMatchError: Your password and confirmation password do not match.
cognito.expiredCodeExceptionError: Invalid code provided, please request a code again.
cognito.invalidPasswordExceptionError: Password does not meet the requirements.

errors.forbidden: You don't have permission for this request, please try it
errors.internalServerError: Some thing went wrong, please try it
errors.invalidPasswordFormat: Invalid password, password include least 6 characters, 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 numeric and 1 special character.
errors.invalidPhoneNumber: Invalid phone, phone include number and least 6 characters.
